articles.title: Restoring a Badly Damaged Watch

articles.description:
Image: PUBG
    

  
Taego even includes a self-revive feature
 PUBG is back with its first new map in a while, and it‚Äôs set in Korea. The new map, Taego, is part of the game‚Äôs 12.2 update, which also adds a self-revive item, a mini-battle royale to get you back into a match after you die, and dozens of other changes. 
Taego is an 8-km-by-8-km map set in the Korean countryside. PUBG in-game unit lead Taehyun Kim said in an email interview with Polygon that the goal of this map was to show players the beauty of Korea, especially around the 1980s and ‚Äô90s. 
The map is full of villages, towns, and even a maximum-security prison for players to explore. Even more importantly, for all the players that have missed PUBG‚Äôs larger maps, Taego has tons of open ground to fight over. 
Image: PUBG Studi‚Ä¶
articles.title: PUBG‚Äôs new map takes players to Korea and lets them come back from the dead

articles.description:
You can download the new DLC now
 Nothing can stop the slow, unrelenting crawl of the Minions empire. 
The babbling buffoons have gotten three Despicable Me movies, a cartoon series, and a Minion-centric spinoff movie, and they‚Äôll star in an upcoming sequel to the offshoot called Minions: The Rise of Gru. Their reach knows no bounds, and now, they‚Äôre available in Minecraft. 
The Minions x Minecraft add-on from Illumination launched Friday, and you can buy it in the Minecraft Marketplace.
The downloadable content does more than just add blocky versions of the yellow one-eyed characters to Minecraft. It also lets you help Gru fight villains like Vicious Six, El Macho, and Vector. It‚Äôs apparently part of the lead-up to Minions: The Rise of Gru, which comes to theaters on July 1, 2022.
Mojang has added skin packs and additional content for countless franchises ‚Äî Mario, Star Wars, Sonic the Hedgehog, you name it. Given how long it‚Äôs been, it‚Äôs about damn time that we get some quality Minions content in the game.
articles.title: Minions are in Minecraft now, thank goodness

articles.description:
Image: Rockstar Games
    

  
Why Red Dead Online‚Äôs issues run deep
 The newest Red Dead Online update, Blood Money, focuses on the criminal side of frontier life. There‚Äôs a new currency, new missions, and lots of quality-of-life changes to the usual cowboy formula. Blood Money is perfectly fine; it doesn‚Äôt transform the game or add elaborate, wild new professions ... but if you like Red Dead Online, you‚Äôll probably like Blood Money.
The problem is that many Red Dead Online players don‚Äôt really seem to like Red Dead Online right now. This cromulent content update has done little to calm down an increasingly frustrated fanbase. So why are cowboys so rootin‚Äô tootin‚Äô mad at Rockstar Games?
Red Dead Online has had a bit of a content drought, especially compared to its sister game Grand Theft ‚Ä¶
articles.title: Red Dead Online‚Äôs new update is pretty good ‚Äî but not enough for fans

articles.description:
Image: Valve
    

  
People ran into all kinds of issues with the process 
 Pre-orders for the Steam Deck went live Friday on Steam, and the rush of people attempting to reserve Valve‚Äôs upcoming handheld PC threatened to overwhelm the Steam servers, causing a raft of errors for potential customers.
The new handheld console was announced on Thursday, with pre-orders opening up on Friday afternoon Eastern time. Those trying to reserve a unit have run into a wide array of issues with the pre-ordering process, including false error messages. The problems impact both those trying to buy the Steam Deck on the Steam website and through the Steam app.
One such error is a notification that says, ‚ÄúYour account is too new to reserve early.‚Äù Multiple Steam users said on social media that they got tha‚Ä¶
articles.title: Even Steam‚Äôs servers buckled under the Steam Deck pre-order rush

articles.description:
Image: Bungie
    

  
Get three weapons and some armor in Trials this week
 Trials of Osiris is back in Destiny 2. Saint-14 is the new Trials vendor and announcer, and players can find him and his wares in the Tower Hangar every Friday at reset.
Each week, the Trials of Osiris map changes, as do the rewards for winning a certain number of matches. The rewards are consistent across all players, although each player‚Äôs weapon roll will differ.
Here are the guaranteed Trials of Osiris rewards this week:
Map: Pacifica
3 wins ‚Äî Igneous Hammer, Energy hand cannon
5 wins ‚Äî Pyrrhic Ascent Strides, Boots, Greaves, leg armor
7 wins ‚Äî Sola‚Äôs Scar, Power sword 
Flawless ‚Äî Exile‚Äôs Curse (Adept), Energy fusion rifle
Note: As of Season of Arrivals, players can complete the End Game weekly bounty ‚Äî which just needs Trials match completions (wins give more progress) ‚Äî to earn the three-win reward.
Players who manage to reach seven wins without a single loss can go to the Lighthouse social space ‚Äî this is called a Flawless run. The Lighthouse offers additional rewards for players, some of which are unique, like a special emblem. Players who reach the Lighthouse also earn a special armor glow for any of their Trials of Osiris armor, which lasts for the remainder of the weekend.
articles.title: Destiny 2 Trials of Osiris rewards, July 16-20

articles.description:
Image: Bungie
    

  
Head to the Tower for some Exotics
 The weekly Exotic item merchant, Xur, hangs out in random locations around the world of Destiny. In Destiny 2, he can appear all over the map, as well as inside the Tower. This week, you can find Xur in the Tower, standing on the back stairs of the Hangar.
Image: Bungie via Polygon
  
Xur‚Äôs inventory this week consists of the following:
Sunshot, Solar hand cannon, Solar trace rifle: 29 Legendary Shards
Ophidia Spathe, Hunter chest: 23 Legendary Shards
Severance Enclosure, Titan chest: 23 Legendary Shards
Ophidian Aspect, Warlock arms: 23 Legendary Shards
Exotic Engram: 97 Legendary Shards (you can now purchase a second with an Exotic Cipher)
Exotic Cipher quest: free


Xur‚Äôs items drop at a similar power level as your character.
Su‚Ä¶
articles.title: Destiny 2 Xur location and items, July 16-20

articles.description:
Image: Nintendo/Sega
    

  
Sonic: Lost World brought Wii U owners the ‚ÄòZelda Zone‚Äô
 The Legend of Zelda: Skyward Sword HD came out Friday for Nintendo Switch, but personally, I can‚Äôt stop thinking about that one time Sonic the Hedgehog went to Hyrule. 
Sonic ventured to The Legend of Zelda Zone as part of downloadable content for Sonic: Lost World, a 3D Sonic game that was released on Wii U and Nintendo 3DS in 2013. The Zelda Zone was essentially a Sonic course that took inspiration from various Zelda games like Ocarina of Time and Skyward Sword. (Sonic also got to visit the Yoshi Zone in a separate bit of DLC for Lost World.)
Throughout the level, Sonic runs through recognizable Zelda locales like Hyrule Field and Death Mountain. Every now and then, we‚Äôll see Link soaring overhead on a Loftwing. At one point, Sonic gets launched up into the air, and Link waves at him.


The level is just really dang cute. In addition to Sonic wearing Link‚Äôs iconic green tunic, it‚Äôs filled with other references. It swaps out Sonic‚Äôs golden rings for rupees. All the music is from Zelda. Also, Sonic can open chests and get new heart containers that expand his health bar. At the very end, Sonic finds a special surprise. You can check out a full playthrough of the level here. 
It‚Äôs fun to see because, besides the occasional brawl, Link and Sonic don't get to meet each other all that much. Here, they both get to adventure through the big green world together.
articles.title: Let us not forget Sonic the Hedgehog‚Äôs weird Zelda: Skyward Sword crossover

articles.description:
Image: Ubisoft
    

  
50-player racing game Riders Republic also gets pushed back
 Ubisoft delayed two of its big 2021 games on Friday, pushing Tom Clancy‚Äôs Rainbow Six Extraction out to January 2022, and Riders Republic back by eight weeks, from Sept. 2 to Oct. 28.
Rainbow Six Extraction, the Rainbow Six-operators-versus-alien-infestation shooter that was previously known as Rainbow Six Quarantine, was originally slated to launch Sept. 16. Ubisoft communicated that date just one month ago, but said in an update posted Friday that the game needs more time.
From Ubisoft‚Äôs statement:
Our ambition with Rainbow Six Extraction is to deliver a full-fledged AAA experience that changes the way you play and think about cooperative games. With unique features like Missing In Action or The Sprawl, ‚Ä¶
articles.title: Rainbow Six Extraction delayed to 2022

articles.description:
Image: Treyarch/Activision
    

  
Over 40 weapons got changes
 Call of Duty season‚Äôs 4 Reloaded patch may not have been earth-shattering for Black Ops Cold War, but Warzone‚Äôs brought way more changes than usual to make up for it. In the latest patch for the battle royale game, Raven Software has rebalanced over 40 guns in the most comprehensive weapon-tuning update Warzone has ever received. 
According to a long note in the patch notes‚Äô weapon-balance section, these changes are designed to help increase the overall time to kill in Warzone. One of the biggest ways that Raven is going about this is by nerfing the torso-damage multiplier for many weapons ‚Äî since it‚Äôs the most commonly hit area of a target. At the same time, Raven says that it wants to promote accuracy, so headshots will con‚Ä¶
articles.title: Call of Duty: Warzone gets its biggest balance update ever

articles.description:
Photo: Valve
    

  
It‚Äôs a perfect indie machine
 The newly announced Steam Deck is a tempting deal, especially for a product that starts at $399. But there‚Äôs one thing worth considering before pre-ordering your own, and that‚Äôs storage space. The $399 model comes with 64 GB of flash memory, which is a bit of a tight squeeze. Games shown in Valve‚Äôs promotional videos, like Control, at 42 GB, and Star Wars Jedi: Fallen Order (55 GB) would gobble up the majority of the drive. Doom Eternal and Death Stranding wouldn‚Äôt fit on the entry-level Steam Deck, due to their size. Each requires 80 GB of storage, according to their Steam pages.
The midrange $529 model has 256 GB of available storage and the $649 top-tier Deck has 512 GB available, solving that issue. Each could handle even the meatiest‚Ä¶
articles.title: The cheapest Steam Deck has a great price, but you‚Äôre gonna need more storage

articles.description:
Image: Grinding Gear Games
    

  
The mode will be live for 48 hours, and then every weekend through the Expedition League
 After multiple years on hiatus, Path of Exile: Royale is back. The action game‚Äôs battle royale mode, which first launched in 2018, will go live on Thursday and run for 48 hours. The mode will continue to appear on the weekends through Path of Exile‚Äôs new Expedition League.
Path of Exile: Royale is a battle royale mode set in the long-running action game. Players pick up loot, level up skills, and battle on an island specially designed for Path of Exile: Royale. The 2021 version of the mode is significantly more polished than the previous iteration, which Grinding Gear Games made on a lark.
‚ÄúWe had a running joke in the office that our fast development speed meant th‚Ä¶
articles.title: Path of Exile: Royale returns starting today

articles.description:
Image: Grinding Gear Games
    

  
Blow up some ancient artifacts and sell them to traders
 Grinding Gear Games revealed Path of Exile‚Äôs latest expansion, Expedition, in a Thursday livestream. Co-founder Chris Wilson announced a host of changes coming to the game, with nearly 20 Skill and Support gems, a Flask rework, new items, the return of Path of Exile: Royale, and more. Grinding Gear Games will launch Path of Exile: Expedition on July 23.
The Expedition expansion adds a new activity where players bomb artifact sites for gear. Commissioned by the Kalguur, players will place traps along the ground to unearth loot and other artifacts. But these explosion also cause ancient Kalguur to rise from the grave and strike back. Players can also use explosives to blow through walls and find secrets, or pick up even better loot by unearthing treasure chests.
Once players have the artifacts, they can then haggle with the Kalguur for more loot. Players will need to balance getting a deal with not pissing of the NPC they‚Äôre trading with.
Grinding Gear Games is also making a lot of big changes with Expedition. Players will gain access to 19 new Skill and Support Gems. This will give players more ways to build their characters, even outside of the new Expedition mode. The studio will also rework the game‚Äôs Flask system, which previously forced players to slam their fingers on keys repeatedly. Before the change, some players even created homemade devices to help press multiple keys simultaneously, the developer said.
All of these additions also come with a host of nerfs, which may be divisive in the community. Grinding Gear Games is starting a new initiative to make Path of Exile more difficult, and it starts with changing the game‚Äôs balance.
Finally, the studio announced the return of Path of Exile: Royale, a battle royale mode inside the popular action game.
articles.title: Path of Exile: Expedition lets you blow loot (and monsters) out of the ground

articles.description:
Image: Valve
    

  
Don‚Äôt want SteamOS? You can get Windows instead
 Don‚Äôt actually want to play Steam games on your Steam Deck? That‚Äôs OK: Valve‚Äôs new handheld device isn‚Äôt a closed system ‚Äî players can download other operating systems and game stores on the device.
Epic Games Store, uPlay, and Origin? All of those will work on the Steam Deck, if you wanted to play there, according to IGN.
Valve announced the handheld device on Thursday. The Nintendo Switch-like device will be available in December starting at $399. Basically, Steam Deck is described as a portable PC, with a bigger footprint than the Nintendo Switch ‚Äî at least slightly. The screen is 7 inches, sandwiched by thumbsticks, a D-pad, and buttons. Trackpads are available on each side of the device, too, with eight triggers on‚Ä¶
articles.title: Valve‚Äôs Steam Deck will let you install anything, including the Epic Games Store

articles.description:
Image: Blizzard Entertainment
    

  
Press F to pay respects
 Garrosh Hellscream is a strange character in the World of Warcraft lore. He rose to prominence during Cataclysm as the Horde‚Äôs Warchief, showed a few glimpses of being a noble and just leader, and then immediately took the train to villain town. Throughout Mists of Pandaria and Warlords of Draenor, he was one of the game‚Äôs central antagonists. He died in Draenor, and we thought we were rid of him ‚Äî but Shadowlands seems to have gone ahead and made that final.
The position of Warchief is technically that of a politician, but Garrosh‚Äôs platform was mostly that he was super racist towards everyone who isn‚Äôt an orc. As a result of this and his other bad decisions, the players formed a raid to storm Orgrimmar. Garrosh was put on tr‚Ä¶
articles.title: World of Warcraft‚Äôs bad boy orc just went out like a total Chad

articles.description:
Co-op action using Steam Decks. | Image: Valve
    

  
Switch-like Steam portable is coming this December
 The Steam Deck is a new handheld device from Valve for playing PC games on the go, the company announced Thursday. The Nintendo Switch-like device is set for release in December starting at $399.
Previously rumored as the ‚ÄúSteamPal,‚Äù the Steam Deck is a portable PC that‚Äôs slightly larger than the Nintendo Switch. It features a 7-inch touchscreen, two thumbsticks, a D-pad, and a four-button layout. There are also two trackpads ‚Äî one on either side of the machine, under the thumbsticks ‚Äî to allow for increased precision. The Steam Deck has eight triggers on its back: four on the device‚Äôs shoulders and four more where the ring and pinky fingers rest.
The Steam Deck will run games from p‚Ä¶
articles.title: Valve announces Steam Deck handheld for PC games

articles.description:
Image: Fatshark/Games Workshop
    

  
Like everything else, Darktide is slipping to next year
 The developer of Warhammer 40,000: Darktide, the Left 4 Dead-like cooperative shooter set in the 40K universe, has delayed the game to spring 2022, according to an announcement posted Thursday to Twitter. Stockholm-based Fatshark said, in a familiar refrain, that the COVID-19 pandemic has impacted its original plan to deliver Darktide later this year.
Marin Wahlund, founder and CEO of Fatshark, announced the delay on social media, explaining, ‚ÄúWe have a responsibility to deliver the best game we possibly can, and frankly we need more time to accomplish this goal. It‚Äôs no secret that building a game during a pandemic is a challenge and we are not immune to this. We are planning to use the extra time to both focus on the level of quality at release, as well as invest in more systems to support Darktide for years to come.‚Äù


Warhammer 40,000: Darktide‚Äôs delay follows similar slips for 2021 games like Ghostwire: Tokyo and Resident Evil Re:Verse, which were announced earlier this week. Fatshark‚Äôs announcement means one less Left 4 Dead-like this year, making room for Back 4 Blood, Rainbow Six: Extraction, and Aliens: Fireteam Elite.
In Darktide, players will take on the role of a group of Imperial Guardsmen, the disposable grunts of the Warhammer 40,000 universe, under the direction of an Inquisitor. Inquisitors are secretive agents, known for rooting out heresy against the Emperor of mankind. As such, they regularly work with forces like the Imperial Guard on an ad-hoc basis. The setting is deep within a hive city, where zombielike creatures roam the halls committing untold gruesome acts.
Warhammer 40,000: Darktide is coming to Windows PC and Xbox Series X, and will be included with Microsoft‚Äôs Xbox Game Pass subscription service.
articles.title: Left 4 Dead-like Warhammer 40K: Darktide delayed to 2022

articles.description:
Image: Crystal Dynamics/Square Enix
    

  
Christopher Judge will take on War for Wakanda‚Äôs King T‚ÄôChalla 
 Christopher Judge ‚Äî who players will recognize as the voice of Kratos from God of War (2018) ‚Äî will voice King T‚ÄôChalla, aka the Black Panther, in Marvel‚Äôs Avengers‚Äô War for Wakanda expansion. Entertainment Weekly broke the news of Judge‚Äôs casting on Thursday. Square Enix and Crystal Dynamics will launch the War for Wakanda expansion, which will add Black Panther to Marvel‚Äôs Avengers‚Äô playable roster, sometime this August.
According to Judge, the actor initially didn‚Äôt want to follow in the late Chadwick Boseman‚Äôs footsteps. ‚ÄúI turned it down straight away,‚Äù Judge told EW. ‚ÄúThere‚Äôs many Black Panthers, but I really didn‚Äôt believe that anyone should ever do T‚ÄôChalla again [after Bos‚Ä¶
articles.title: God of War Kratos actor to voice Black Panther in Marvel‚Äôs Avengers

articles.description:
Image: Rockstar Games
    

  
Los Santos Tuners arrives July 20
 The next update to GTA Online is called Los Santos Tuners, and it is set to arrive on July 20, Rockstar Games announced Thursday. As you can probably guess from the title, this update is all about the ‚ÄúAuto‚Äù part of Grand Theft Auto.
Players who are into the social side of the game can go to the LS Car Meet, a new space for underground street racers. This is a venue where car aficionados can go without dealing with the chaos of a public server, a safe place where you can simply show off your stylish ride. There‚Äôs a test track that allows you to give your friend‚Äôs car a spin, and you can demo the game‚Äôs newest cars as well.
The LS Car Meet comes with new races, too. Some of them take place at the Car Meet, while others use the streets of Los Santos on a track. Of course, an update like this also wouldn‚Äôt be complete without new cars. These vehicles are designed to be highly customizable, and is scheduled to be released in two waves, so players can mix and match to create the perfect ride.
There are also illegal elements to the new arena, of course. Getaway drivers and fearless stunt riders will be able to pick up jobs that need a good, solid wheelman. For GTA$50,000, players can sign up to become a member, which unlocks a new progression track called Reputation. Level up your Reputation, and you can get new benefits and rewards, like unique tattoos and merch.
Ten new cars will drop on July 20, with an additional seven dropping over the rest of the summer. When GTA Online launches for PlayStation 5 and Xbox Series X, some of these vehicles will be eligible for special improvements ‚Äî only for people who are playing on those consoles, which will give them a nice edge.
Players can expect more content this summer. Rockstar teased a look at ‚ÄúContracts‚Äù for new robberies that require some talented driving to pull off.
articles.title: GTA Online‚Äôs next update is all about going fast in cool cars

articles.description:
Image: Bandai Namco
    

  
Free-to-play FPS Gundam Evolution is coming to PC  
 Gundam Evolution is a new first-person shooter set in the world of Mobile Suit Gundam. Two teams of six players square off in arenas where they fight to capture points using special abilities ‚Äî and the occasional ultimate ability ‚Äî as famous mobile suits. And yeah, after watching the debut trailer for Gundam Evolution, this really does look like Overwatch.
It‚Äôs not just the game structure; Gundam Evolution follows the hero-shooter formula for sure. It‚Äôs also the interface, which is nearly identical to Blizzard‚Äôs UI for Overwatch (and Overwatch 2). That‚Äôs excusable ‚Äî it‚Äôs a clean, easy-to-parse interface. The good stuff is blue, the bad stuff is red, and I know exactly where to look to check my cooldowns and ultimate ability meter.
Gundam Evolution will have three game modes, according to its official website: Point Capture, in which teams fight for control over spots on the map; Domination, where teams vie to capture one of three randomly available points; and Destruction, where one team is tasked with destroying an object while the other attempts to protect it. So far, there is no payload-delivery mode ... perhaps a smart admission that no one ever wants to be on the payload.
Publisher Bandai Namco says Gundam Evolution will be free to play when it‚Äôs released on Windows PC. A Japanese release is confirmed, but there‚Äôs no word yet on a Western localization.
It‚Äôs a big week for Gundam games. Bandai Namco announced Wednesday that Super Robot Wars 30, the mecha anime mashup role-playing game series, is headed to the West, featuring giant mechs and robots from Mobile Suit Gundam, Mazinger, Getter Robo, SSSS.Gridman, and other series.
articles.title: New Gundam shooter looks a lot like Overwatch

articles.description:
Destiny 2 | Image: Bungie
    

  
Even hardcore Destiny players can‚Äôt play content without hours of grinding
 I‚Äôm a hardcore Destiny 2 player. I organize day-one raid races with my Fireteam and we regularly spend 16+ hours working for that completion. I‚Äôve spent thousands of hours in the game. But the artificial grind for more in-game Power is preventing me from doing some of the game‚Äôs hardest content. 
Destiny 2 veterans know what I mean. Instead of working to improve my ability in Destiny 2, giving me an edge in some of the game‚Äôs best content, I‚Äôm spending my time completing boring bounties to level up my Artifact Power.
For Destiny players who want to compete in Grandmaster Nightfalls and the new Master version of the Vault of Glass raid, we have hours and weeks of homework to get do‚Ä¶
articles.title: Destiny¬†2 is gatekeeping hardcore players from playing what they want

articles.description:
Image: Dread Hunger Team/Digital Confectioners
    

  
Currently available in Early Access
 Early access title Dread Hunger is a little like Among Us, but mixed together with a doomed Arctic voyage and dark magic. The game is currently in early access, but will launch as a full release in the fall.
In a match of Dread Hunger, eight explorers take off on a 19th century Arctic exploration. There‚Äôs just one problem: two of them are Thralls, and they want to make sure everyone dies in the icy coldness. That‚Äôs bad! The explorers have to work as a team, repairing their ship and pushing forward through the harsh climate before they are eliminated by sneaky Thralls. There‚Äôs also voice chat built in, which adds a fun role-play element ‚Äî it‚Äôs like getting to star in The Terror.
Thralls also have more tools to sabotage the expedition than your average impostor. They can poison food, detonate explosives on the ship, and even cast dark rituals. There are also external threats, like wolves and cannibals. Don‚Äôt worry though. If things get too grim, you can absolutely eat your fellow explorers for a quick pick me up.
The newest update is called The Great Hunt, and it brings a new map called the Summit, a deadly polar bear, and a character called the Hunter who uses a bow.
articles.title: Betray and eat your friends in this Among Us-style Arctic survival game

articles.description:
Image: Blizzard Entertainment
    

  
The developer has taken a few wrong turns
 I‚Äôve been a fan of Blizzard games since I was a kid. I love the pulp and drama of their settings, the polished cinematics and bold characters. But over the past few years, I‚Äôve become frustrated. Part of this is almost certainly that I‚Äôm getting older and less patient, but a big part of it comes from the games themselves. 
World of Warcraft: Shadowlands is a narrative mess that recently culminated in a big reveal centering around split souls, rewriting reality, and villain monologuing. Overwatch, on the other hand, is stuck in the past ‚Äî we won‚Äôt get to see the actual Overwatch organization in action until Overwatch 2, which currently does not have a release date. 
Both settings have a comic book-y vibe, bigg‚Ä¶
articles.title: Blizzard learned all the wrong lessons from the MCU

articles.description:
Image: Treyarch/Activision
    

  
Plus new maps and a new gun
 Call of Duty: Black Ops Cold War‚Äôs new midseason update is here, but it might be a little smaller than most players expect. After some substantial updates in the last couple of patches, Treyarch has decided to take a slower approach this time around, keeping most of its balance changes limited to Zombies mode and letting the new content be the star of the show. 
Even the Zombies changes aren‚Äôt that sweeping, but they do give a boost to two of the mode‚Äôs most overlooked weapon types: melee weapons and sniper rifles. Melee weapons now do 2,500 damage instead of 2,000, and their level 3 Pack-a-Punch upgrades do five times more damage instead of four. Meanwhile, five different sniper rifles had various buffs to attributes like cr‚Ä¶
articles.title: Black Ops Cold War‚Äôs new patch¬†buffs Zombies mode‚Äôs worst weapons

articles.description:
Image: DICE/Electronic Arts
    

  
DICE gets into the nitty-gritty details about this year‚Äôs Battlefield
 Battlefield 2042 will include cross-platform play between PlayStation 5, Windows PC, and Xbox Series X, developer DICE and publisher Electronic Arts confirmed Wednesday. Players on PlayStation 4 and Xbox One platforms will also be able to play against each other, but given the maximum player-count difference (64 players vs. 128 players) between last-gen and current-gen consoles, cross-generation play will not be included in this year‚Äôs Battlefield.
In a blog post, DICE also confirmed that players on PC and consoles can opt out of playing against each other, addressing concerns about skill differences between mouse and keyboard and gamepad players.
DICE says it will test out cross-play functionality during Battlefield 2042‚Äôs technical play test, which was scheduled to go live sometime in July, but has since been delayed to ‚Äúlater this summer.‚Äù
Players who expect to play across multiple platforms also got some good news today: DICE says it‚Äôs building cross-progression and cross-commerce for Battlefield 2042, which will be shared across all platforms. ‚ÄúYour unlocked progress and purchases in your PlayStation copy of the game will carry over onto the Xbox or PC version, and vice versa,‚Äù DICE said.
More details about Battlefield 2042‚Äôs gameplay changes are available at the game‚Äôs official website.
Battlefield 2042 was unveiled in June, promising massive maps for up to 128 players, real-time destructive weather, and near-future weapons of war. At E3 2021, EA and DICE showed off gameplay from the first-person shooter. Battlefield 2042 is bound for PS4, PS5, Windows PC, Xbox One, and Xbox Series X on Oct. 22.
articles.title: Battlefield 2042 will include cross-play, cross-progression

articles.description:
Image: B.B. Studio/Bandai Namco
    

  
Super Robot Wars 30 brings mecha anime RPG series to Steam for the first time
 The Super Robot Wars series is heading West after more than a decade-long absence. Publisher Bandai Namco will bring Super Robot Wars 30, a new entry in the tactical strategy game series that brings together mechs from Mobile Suit Gundam, Mazinger Z, Mazinkaiser, Getter Robo, SSSS.Gridman, and other series, to North America and Europe on Oct. 27.
A Steam version is confirmed, and it‚Äôs available for pre-order. Bandai Namco has not announced a Western release of the Nintendo Switch and PlayStation 4 versions, which appear to be exclusive to Japan and the rest of Asia for now.
Super Robot Wars 30 celebrates the 30th anniversary of the series, which debuted on the original Ga‚Ä¶
articles.title: Gundam, Mazinger, SSSS.Gridman, and more collide in new Super Robot Wars game

articles.description:
Two versions of NBA 2K22‚Äôs NBA 75th Anniversary Edition cover and their painter, artist Charly Palmer. | Photo: 2K Sports
    

  
Two editions to feature paintings by renowned artist Charly Palmer
 NBA 2K22 is scheduled to launch worldwide on Sept. 10 with six different cover athletes across four editions of the game, led by Dallas Mavericks star Luka Donƒçiƒá, publisher 2K Sports announced Wednesday.
Donƒçiƒá, a two-time NBA All-Star in his three seasons in the league, will grace the cover of NBA 2K22‚Äôs Standard Edition and Cross-Gen Digital Bundle. The background of the Standard Edition features artwork of a shouting Donƒçiƒá draped in thick brushstrokes of blue, white, and red ‚Äî a nod to the flag of his native country, Slovenia.
2K Sports is continuing its policy of charging $10 extra for it‚Ä¶
articles.title: NBA 2K22 coming in September with Doncic, Durant, Dirk, Kareem on the covers

articles.description:
Image: Relic Entertainment/Sega
    

  
Relic‚Äôs new game includes a pause feature and a dynamic campaign map
 Company of Heroes 3 is on the way from Relic Entertainment. This time around, the World War II strategy game series will focus on the Mediterranean theater, with campaigns in Italy and North Africa. Fans can play an early build of the game on Steam for free starting today through Aug. 2.
Relic tells Polygon that CoH3 is still in active development, and more than a year away from release.
The original Company of Heroes was released in 2006, while its sequel was launched in 2013. The real-time strategy (RTS) franchise is well known for its small-unit AI, which allows individual soldiers to take cover and use terrain to their advantage. Company of Heroes 3 will include more of that s‚Ä¶
articles.title: Company of Heroes 3 sends the war to the Mediterranean, and you can play it today

articles.description:
Image: Treyarch
    

  
Season 4 Reloaded will also finally let players explore Mauer Der Toten
 Call of Duty: Black Ops Cold War and Warzone‚Äôs mid-season update will include new weapons, new multiplayer maps, and a new spot to survive the undead hordes of Zombies mode. The patch still isn‚Äôt due for another day, but on Monday Treyarch gave fans a preview of the new update.
The highlight of the season 4 Reloaded patch is Mauer Der Toten, Call of Duty: Black Ops Cold War‚Äôs newest round-based Zombies map. The new map is set in a sprawling block of Berlin and will feature everything from rooftops to U-Bahn trains. Mauer Der Toten will also introduce a few new enemies, a new Wonder Weapon with four unique variants, and plenty more secrets and Easter eggs for players to discover. 
Image: Treyar‚Ä¶
articles.title: Call of Duty gets paintball, Capture the Flag, and a Warzone objective mode this season

articles.description:
Image: Ubisoft
    

  
A classic callback
 Sick of Eivor in Assassin‚Äôs Creed Valhalla? You can now turn them into master assassin Alta√Ør ‚Äî the original protagonist from Assassin‚Äôs Creed. OK, it won‚Äôt actually be Alta√Ør, but you can dress up Eivor to wear the iconic outfit that Alta√Ør wears.
Ubisoft is giving away the Alta√Ør costume through its Ubisoft Connect program, which is a free thing that‚Äôs supposed to connect players across platforms. In Assassin‚Äôs Creed Valhalla and a few other Ubisoft games, that means progression is saved between console and PC, too. But it also means different skins and weapons for free or with Ubisoft Connect points, called Units. (You can get units by playing Ubisoft games and leveling in Ubisoft Connect. It‚Äôs basically a loyalty program.)


Channel the master Alta√Ør with the Legacy outfit, available now for Assassin's Creed Valhalla from @UbisoftConnect  
  https://t.co/hZ4OTL0CoT pic.twitter.com/abN5xMQIpA
‚Äî Ubisoft (@Ubisoft) July 13, 2021



The Alta√Ør outfit was previously available as a community reward in March, but this is a second chance for players to snag the ‚Äôfit. To get it, players have to sign up for Ubisoft Connect and redeem their Units on the Rewards page. From there, it‚Äôll be unlocked in the game to be equipped through the inventory menu, Ubisoft said.
It‚Äôs no ‚Äúturn your raven into a pigeon,‚Äù but the Alta√Ør outfit is still quite good.
articles.title: Assassin‚Äôs Creed Valhalla gets free Alta√Ør cosplay

articles.description:
Image: Square Enix
    

  
Look at this asshole
 The 1999 PlayStation game Legend of Mana, recently remastered for the Nintendo Switch, PlayStation 4, and Windows PC, is a bit of an acquired taste. It‚Äôs an aggressively weird fantasy game that is also half a dozen other games in one, and it‚Äôs not particularly great at anything it tries. Yet I have nothing but fondness for this strange little experiment, since it‚Äôs incredibly charming throughout. Except when it comes to Niccolo, the bunny salesman. He‚Äôs a piece of shit. 
Niccolo is one of the first characters you can meet in Legend of Mana. He‚Äôs a salesman with a whole schtick about making all of his customers smile thanks to the value he brings to their lives. There is nothing true about this. He‚Äôs a conniving bastard, and he‚Äôs also racist‚Ä¶
articles.title: Meet the worst person in video games: Legend of Mana‚Äôs racist bunny

articles.description:
Image: Tango Gameworks/Bethesda Softworks
    

  
PS5 and PC horror game now coming in ‚Äòearly 2022‚Äô
 Ghostwire: Tokyo, the next game from The Evil Within developer Tango Gameworks, won‚Äôt make its previously scheduled release date. Originally expected in 2021, the game has been delayed to sometime in ‚Äúearly 2022,‚Äù the studio announced Tuesday in a statement posted to the game‚Äôs official Twitter account.
‚ÄúWe want to get the game in your hands as soon as possible so you can experience the unforgettable version of a haunted Tokyo that we‚Äôve been hard at work building,‚Äù the developer said. ‚ÄúAt the same time, we‚Äôre also focused on protecting the health of everyone at Tango. Our new release window will give us time to bring the world of Ghostwire to life as we‚Äôve always envisioned it.‚Äù
An update‚Ä¶
articles.title: Ghostwire: Tokyo delayed to ‚Äòprotect the health‚Äô of its creators

articles.description:
Image: PlatinumGames/Square Enix
    

  
Square Enix confirms what‚Äôs changing
 Square Enix‚Äôs promised update for the Windows PC version of Nier: Automata is coming this Thursday, according to an update on the game‚Äôs Steam page. The Steam-specific patch will include updates to stabilize Nier: Automata‚Äôs frame rate, as well as add 4K resolution textures for certain visuals, and additional graphics tweaks.
Nier: Automata‚Äôs Steam patch was announced in April, shortly after the game came to Game Pass for PC and players noticed that that version was technically superior to the previously released version available through Valve‚Äôs digital storefront.
Nier: Automata launched on Windows PC in March 2017, about two weeks after its PlayStation 4 debut in the West. Reviews of the PC version panned it‚Ä¶
articles.title: Nier: Automata‚Äôs promised Steam patch coming July 15

articles.description:
Image: Frontier Developments
    

  
Frontier Developments explains why
 Elite Dangerous is currently in turmoil, and developer Frontier Developments is taking steps to get the situation under control. The recent Odyssey update caused issues, leading to frame-rate drops, buggy planet generation, and other issues. Fixing up Odyssey has changed the timeline of Elite Dangerous‚Äôs other updates, and fans have been frustrated.
Console players are going to have to wait to get their hands on Odyssey while Frontier Developments fixes up the PC version of the game. The Odyssey update was a massive undertaking, tens of thousands of new places to go and the ability to explore worlds on foot. It was originally meant to arrive on consoles on fall 2021. There is no new release date as of yet.
David Braben, the CEO and founder of Frontier, explained the studio‚Äôs decision in a thorough post on the game‚Äôs official forums. He wrote,
Ultimately, we believe it is right to focus our efforts on the core Elite Dangerous Odyssey experience for the platforms that we have released on, before opening up to more. We know that the work that we do to improve players‚Äô experiences of Elite Dangerous Odyssey on PC will benefit other platforms in the future, but the dates and details of the console platforms are going to change. We do not want to rush into confirming any dates or changes this has on our console release, as we must remain fully focused on the core Elite experience. Only when we feel that the foundation of the PC release is solid, will we be able to re-lay our console roadmap on top.

The team intends to focus on game updates that fix bugs and improve performance, as well as add additional features to the game. ‚ÄúBehind every bug fix, design decision and community post is a person who cares a lot about giving our players best possible experience,‚Äù said Braben.
Elite Dangerous is currently available for PlayStation 4 and Xbox One.
articles.title: Elite Dangerous‚Äô Odyssey update delayed indefinitely for consoles

articles.description:
Image: Epic Games
    

  
King James Icon skin arrives on July 14
 LeBron James is the newest Fortnite Icon skin. The Los Angeles Lakers superstar, and soon to be Space Jam 2 leading man, will arrive in the game with his own unique outfits and accessories on Wednesday. 
James‚Äô Fortnite skin includes three specially designed outfits for players to choose from. Among these skins is a Taco Tuesday-themed option, and a Tune Squad option that features James in his uniform from the upcoming movie Space Jam: A New Legacy. The skins also comes with the King‚Äôs Back Bling, and can be bought in a bundle that includes the Wingspan Glider, Lion Pickaxe, and the Silencer Emote ‚Äî one of James‚Äô signature on-court celebrations.  
LeBron James isn‚Äôt the only international superstar that Epic Games has collaborated with for a Fortnite skin. The game also has skins from streamers like Ninja, athletes like Neymar Jr., and musicians like Travis Scott and Marshmello, not to mention the variety of fictional characters in the game as well. 
James‚Äô Fortnite skin will be available in the in-game shop starting July 14.
articles.title: LeBron James is coming to Fortnite

articles.description:
Image: Riot Games
    

  
Getting back into League‚Äôs lore
 For years, League of Legends lore has been hit or miss, a mass of retcons and origin stories. For a while, I checked out, exhausted with the constant origin stories that never seemed to lead anywhere. Now, between Wild Rift and the current Sentinels of Light story, I‚Äôm fully back on the hype train. I haven‚Äôt been this pumped about League in years, and it‚Äôs largely because of the Avengers-style team-up currently going on in the world of Runeterra.
I‚Äôve been faithfully following along since the early days, when half of the champions were essentially aliens who had been teleported to this fantasy world and then conscripted into gladiator status. The original nations were vaguely defined with themes like ‚ÄúPirate Town‚Äù and ‚ÄúBad Guys.‚Äù ‚Ä¶
articles.title: League of Legends is finally having its Avengers moment

articles.description:
Image: Concerned Ape/Shekurika
    

  
Now you can see fish sprites below the water
 Stardew Valley is the game that just keeps on giving. Since its release in 2016, it has seen more than its fair share of generous updates. However, there‚Äôs still little things you could improve here and there. Thanks to a mod from Shekurika, one part of the game just got a little easier to play: fishing. If you use it, you‚Äôll be able to see the fish below the water. 
Usually in Stardew Valley, you cast your line onto the the blank slate of the open water. Unlike similar games like Animal Crossing: New Horizons, you don't see shadows of fish or even a disturbance on the surface of the water. Oftentimes, you‚Äôll have to cast your lure in a few spots before you get a bite. This mod changes the game so you‚Äôll be able see all the fish‚Äôs sprites spawn in the water. That way, you know exactly where to place your lure if you‚Äôre looking for a specific fish to flesh out your collection or complete a recipe. 
It‚Äôs a thoughtful adjustment because fishing in Stardew can be a little bit tricky. The rod is slightly finicky, and you‚Äôll lose fish after hooking them if you aren‚Äôt careful. It‚Äôs probably one of the hardest skills to learn in the game. This mod cuts down on the grind and helps you to catch what you need, even if you aren‚Äôt the most skilled angler. 
The mod also adds a few bonus configuration options. If you want, you can tweak how many fish spawn on the map to create more fish. Also, you can toggle an option to allow the player to see the game‚Äôs other ‚Äúfishable‚Äù items ‚Äî like a rusty spoon and spur ‚Äî as well. 
The mod is currently published on Nexus Mods ‚Äî and due to a recent policy change on the website, this and all its other mods will be permanently stored online. So if this seems like a feature you‚Äôd like, well you have all the time in the world to grab it.
articles.title: Stardew Valley mod fixes one of its biggest annoyances

articles.description:
Image: Visceral Games
    


  
Visceral Games‚Äô horror game manages the perfect balance of stress and spectacle
 Dead Space 2 was released ten years ago. In the time since, we‚Äôve seen the size and ambition of in-game setpieces balloon. Games like God of War place huge importance on their cinematic camera techniques. The recently released Resident Evil 8 has some of the most technically complex scenes ever put in a horror game. 
And yet. Even a decade removed from Dead Space 2, I still think it pulls off tense action sequences better than most modern games. Through a combination of clearly communicated motivations, well-considered pacing, and staggering aesthetic design, Dead Space 2‚Äôs setpieces continue to stand tall with the best of the medium. 



This essay on Dead Space 2 was written a‚Ä¶
articles.title: Dead Space 2‚Äôs setpieces remain unmatched

articles.description:
Image: CD Projekt Red
    

  
The game‚Äôs ultimate form got announced at WitcherCon
 Geralt of Rivia‚Äôs third video game adventure will get some new gear inspired by Netflix's The Witcher series.
At the first WitcherCon, streamed remotely via YouTube, CD Projekt Red reminded fans that it‚Äôs working on a next-gen update for The Witcher 3, which comes with the Complete Edition subtitle. The upgrade is set for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series X, and Windows PC. Fans who already own The Witcher 3 will get the Complete Edition upgrade for free.
The Complete Edition also comes with ‚Äúfree DLC‚Äù to make the game‚Äôs Geralt a bit more reminiscent of actor Henry Cavill. A developer from CD Projekt Red suggested that fans could pick up new armor modeled after Cavill‚Äôs Netflix series getup. But Netflix-inspired armor won‚Äôt be the only additions to the game taken from the show, and the studio promised to reveal more details at a later date.
CD Projekt Red did not reveal a timeline for The Witcher 3: Complete Edition upgrade. The studio‚Äôs other game, Cyberpunk 2077, is also set for a next-gen upgrade later this year.
articles.title: The Witcher 3 Complete Edition is a next-gen update with gear from the Netflix series

articles.description:
Image: miHoYo/YouTube
    

  
The highly anticipated region is finally here 
 MiHoYo released a new trailer for the latest update of its free-to-play open world adventure, Genshin Impact, on Friday. The new look shows off the long-awaited Inazuma region in an expansion the studio is calling The Immovable God and the Eternal Euthymia. The 2.0 version will debut an entirely new region to explore, three new characters, and cross-save functionality between platforms. The update is scheduled to unroll on July 21. 
It‚Äôs truly a massive update that fans have been eagerly awaiting. Beyond content, it‚Äôs bringing a significant new feature: cross-saves across PlayStation 5, PlayStation 4, PC, Android, and iOS. Fans will finally be able to switch between mobile and console. 
The newly released five-m‚Ä¶
articles.title: Genshin Impact‚Äôs enormous Inazuma update gets a release date and trailer

articles.description:
Image: Bungie
    

  
Pick up two weapons and two armor pieces
 Trials of Osiris is back in Destiny 2. Saint-14 is the new Trials vendor and announcer, and players can find him and his wares in the Tower Hangar every Friday at reset.
Each week, the Trials of Osiris map changes, as do the rewards for winning a certain number of matches. The rewards are consistent across all players, although each player‚Äôs weapon roll will differ.
Here are the guaranteed Trials of Osiris rewards this week:
Map: Javelin-4
3 wins ‚Äî  Pyrrhic Ascent Vest, Plate, Vestment (Hunter, Titan, and Warlock chest)
5 wins ‚Äî Eye of Sol, Kinetic sniper rifle
7 wins ‚Äî Pyrrhic Ascent Cloak, Mark, Bond (Hunter, Titan, and Warlock class item)
Flawless ‚Äî Shayura‚Äôs Wrath (Adept), Void submachine gun ‚Äî random Adept mod
Note: As of Season of Arrivals, players can complete the End Game weekly bounty ‚Äî which just needs Trials match completions (wins give more progress) ‚Äî to earn the three-win reward.
Players who manage to reach seven wins without a single loss can go to the Lighthouse social space ‚Äî this is called a Flawless run. The Lighthouse offers additional rewards for players, some of which are unique, like a special emblem. Players who reach the Lighthouse also earn a special armor glow for any of their Trials of Osiris armor, which lasts for the remainder of the weekend.
articles.title: Destiny 2 Trials of Osiris rewards, July 9-13

articles.description:
Image: Bungie
    

  
Head to Nessus for some Exotics
 The weekly Exotic item merchant, Xur, hangs out in random locations around the world of Destiny. In Destiny 2, he can appear all over the map, as well as inside the Tower. This week, you can find Xur on Nessus, standing on a big tree in the Watcher‚Äôs Grave.
Image: Bungie via Polygon
  
Xur‚Äôs inventory this week consists of the following:
Fighting Lion, Void Special grenade launcher: 29 Legendary Shards
The Sixth Coyote, Hunter chest: 23 Legendary Shards
Armamentarium, Titan chest: 23 Legendary Shards
Wings of Sacred Dawn, Warlock chest: 23 Legendary Shards
Exotic Engram: 97 Legendary Shards (you can now purchase a second with an Exotic Cipher)
Exotic Cipher quest: free


Xur‚Äôs items drop at a similar power level as your character.
Fig‚Ä¶
articles.title: Destiny 2 Xur location and items, July 9-13

articles.description:
Image: Capcom via Polygon
    


  
Who is the real monster here?
 I love Monster Hunter, but I try not to think about it too hard. 
Monster Hunter is a series that asks me to kill big beasts with sharp fangs and occasionally cuddly tummies. More often than not, they‚Äôre existing peacefully in their own ecosystem before I waltz in with my giant horn of doom to turn them into hats, pants, and an entire ensemble for my cat. I cannot pluck a single feather and save the monster. It‚Äôs a kill-or-be-killed series, and I‚Äôve collected a lot of pelts over the years. 
With Monster Hunter Stories 2: Wings of Ruin, a follow-up to the 2016 turn-based RPG, I was looking forward to a more symbiotic relationship with the monsters. As a Rider, I get to work alongside a companion monster that I raise from bir‚Ä¶
articles.title: Monster Hunter Stories 2 makes me feel even more uncomfortable about killing monsters

articles.description:
Image: Netflix
    

  
The convention will include two separate streams throughout Saturday
 Netflix and CD Projekt Red have teamed up for the first WitcherCon, a streaming event dedicated entirely to the series, video games, board games, card games, and universe of The Witcher. WitcherCon will be held on Friday, July 9 and will be completely virtual, with every panel available to stream for free.
The event will feature two streams, with the first starting at 1 p.m. ET and the second starting at 9 p.m. ET. Both streams will include similar panels with unique content, according to Netflix and CD Projekt Red. 
The event will feature appearances from members of the cast and crew of Netflix‚Äôs main Witcher series and spinoff, as well as several game developers from CD Projekt Red. WitcherCon w‚Ä¶
articles.title: How to watch WitcherCon, from Netflix and CD Projekt Red

articles.description:
Image: Superbrothers/Pine Scented
    

  
It‚Äôs a muted take on an exploration game 
 The co-creator of Sword & Sworcery, Superbrothers, released new details on their sci-fi game, Jett: The Far Shore for Sony‚Äôs State of Play on Thursday. Superbrothers is creating the game in partnership with Pine Scented. A PlayStation blog on the game has an extended trailer as well as plenty of new gameplay details. 
The game looks like a more introspective take on sci-fi exploration. You play as Mei, a researcher who is part of a group of aviator scientists who embark on an interstellar trip and arrive on an ocean planet. ‚ÄúWe aspired to create a video game to express our own feelings of awe when we look up at the starry sky,‚Äù the trailer says. 
The new look showed a deeper dive into gameplay. In Jett, you‚Äôll be flying a lot; you‚Äôll pilot your spaceship in third person and weave your way through trees and obstacles. As you explore, you‚Äôll be able to leave your ship and explore the land on foot as well, in first-person view. 
The trailer explains that the game doesn‚Äôt rely on combat or resource extraction. You‚Äôll have the opportunity to respect the indigenous wildlife of the planet. Overall, it looks like like a much more peaceful, less violent take on an exploration game ‚Äî which is a genre that has historically pushed players to harvest as much as possible from the land. 
Jett: The Far Shore was originally announced in June 2020. Since then, the studio has said that the game would be delayed to 2021. It is still slated to release in 2021 for the PlayStation 5, PlayStation 4, and on PC via the Epic Games Store.
articles.title: Sword & Sworcery co-creator‚Äôs next game looks like an ultra-chill No Man‚Äôs Sky

articles.description:
Image: Capcom via Polygon
    

  
How to train your Monstie
 In Monster Hunter Stories 2: Wings of Ruin, you‚Äôll join forces with monsters to defeat other monsters. The companions you take on are called Monsties, and they are as valuable to your success as the armor and weapons you forge.
Having the best gear in the game doesn‚Äôt matter if you aren‚Äôt sure what to choose. To figure out which weapons are the right ones to use for each occasion, check out our weapons guide. Once you‚Äôre well-equipped, head over to our combat guide. Fighting with the best gear isn‚Äôt all you‚Äôll need to survive. Read our guide on how to combine items to make sure you always have the right healing items on hand.
Adding more Monsties to your party requires you to find the best eggs scattered across the game world. You‚Äôll find them in caves and Everdens as you explore. If you want to pay for the best gear and be stronger than your enemies, you‚Äôll need to learn how to farm for zenny and level up fast.
articles.title: Monster Hunter Stories 2: Wings of Ruin guides, tips, and tricks

articles.description:
Image: Bilibili
    

  
The game‚Äôs new trailer shows off action-platforming and impressive graphics
 FIST: Forged in Shadow Torch is a 2D Metroidvania-style platformer where animals take on machines that have invaded their world. FIST got a new trailer during Sony‚Äôs State of Play PlayStation stream on Thursday, along with a new release date of Sept. 7.
The game stars Rayton, a rabbit who has been hiding for the last six years since the machines took over his city. When his friend is kidnapped, Rayton has to come out of hiding and face the machines. Like most games in this genre, FIST will feature a huge 2D environment for players to explore, complete with a variety of secrets and upgrades to find. The game features an arcade-style combat system that will allow Rayton to take enemies out with a variety of weapons that he can use for powerful combos.
FIST was first announced back in July 2020 as a PlayStation 4 game. A few months later at The Game Awards 2020, it was revealed that the game would come to PlayStation 4 and PlayStation 5 and would be out in Spring 2021. Unfortunately, the game didn‚Äôt make it in time for spring, but now seems set for a fall release. 
FIST: Forged in Shadow Torch is developed by Bilibili and published by TiGames. The game will be released on Sept. 7 on PC, PlayStation 4, and PlayStation 5.
articles.title: FIST: Forged in Shadow Torch is a Metroidvania game about a war between machines and animals

articles.description:
Image: Sloclap
    

  
You‚Äôll have to wait a bit longer
 Absolver developer Sloclap announced that its kung fu brawler, Sifu, is delayed to early 2022.
The announcement came at the end of a new teaser trailer presented during PlayStation‚Äôs State of Play event on Thursday. The game was originally slated to come out in 2021. 
In the game, you are tasked with uncovering an ‚Äúancient mystery via a series of difficult confrontations that will test your skills to their limit.‚Äù To overcome the odds, the protagonist uses a magical pendant that revives them after death. There‚Äôs just one twist ‚Äî each time your character uses the pendant, they age. 
The new trailer showed the smooth combat that the studio is known for in action. Sloclap billed the game as ‚Äúan artful and true-to-combat Kung Fu game exploring themes of revenge and redemption‚Äù when the studio first announced it. 
Throughout the trailer, the main character battles against various opponents, taking roundhouse kicks to the head and dishing out blows in return. Periodically, the trailer includes title cards that show the character‚Äôs age ticking upward. As they age, their character design changes; they become noticeably older, and their hair turns gray. 
Sifu will come to PlayStation 5, PlayStation 4, and Windows PC (via the Epic Games Store).
articles.title: Kung fu brawler Sifu delayed to early 2022

articles.description:
Image: CyberConnect2/Sega
    

  
Demon Slayer arrives in October
 Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba ‚Äî The Hinokami Chronicles, an adaptation of the enormously popular anime, got a spotlight trailer during Thursday‚Äôs PlayStation State of Play event. The game features voice work from the series‚Äô original English and Japanese-language actors.
Thursday‚Äôs trailer also showed more of the game in action. The Hinokami Chronicles will adapt the Tanjiro Kamado, Unwavering Resolve Arc and Mugen Train Arc from Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba. Today‚Äôs trailer featured Tsuzumi Mansion, giving fans a look at both gameplay and story.
Demon Slayer is being developed by CyberConnect 2, best known for their work on Dragon Ball and Naruto titles. The story is a tale of love, loss, becoming a legendary demon blade, and then trying to save your sister from being a demon. In other words: a concept which should work well for a 3D fighting game.
Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba ‚Äî The Hinokami Chronicles will arrive Oct. 15. The game will be released on PlayStation 4, PlayStation 5, Windows PC (via Steam), Xbox One, and Xbox Series X.
articles.title: Demon Slayer‚Äôs new trailer shows off the game‚Äôs Tsuzumi Mansion

articles.description:
Image: Arkane Studios/Bethesda Softworks
    

  
Check out the new trailer for Sony‚Äôs last Bethesda exclusive 
 Arkane Studios and Bethesda Softworks showed off a nine-minute gameplay trailer for Deathloop at Sony‚Äôs State of Play on July 8. The trailer offered a new look at the studio‚Äôs stylish assassination game.
Deathloop takes place in a time-loop on a mysterious island called Blackreef. Players will take control of Colt, an assassin out to kill eight targets before a single day is through. The point of Deathloop is to fail, gain knowledge of your target‚Äôs whereabouts and behaviors, and start again on a new day with a new time-loop. Deathloop‚Äôs game director, Dinga Bakaba described it as a ‚Äúmurder puzzle.‚Äù
Throughout the nine-minute gameplay trailer shown Thursday, Arkane Studios showed what this sort of gameplay looks like. It focuses largely on a single level featuring a flashy murder club. You can check it out in the trailer above.
To aid him on his quest, Colt has access to some intense powers, including the ability to teleport, throw things with his mind, and wind back time. He‚Äôs also being tracked by another assassin named Julianna ‚Äî who can be controlled by another, invading player or traditional AI.
Deathloop may look similar to the studio‚Äôs other titles ‚Äî namely Dishonored and Prey ‚Äî but it has its own 1960s spy-thriller visual style and a new structure. Arkane and Bethesda will launch Deathloop for PlayStation 5 and Windows PC on Sept. 14.
articles.title: Sony shows off new Deathloop gameplay at State of Play

articles.description:
Image: Crystal Dynamics/Square Enix
    

  
He‚Äôs got six of ‚Äôem
 You can now play Marvel‚Äôs Avengers as a shirtless, buff Captain America. The most recent patch for the game adds some Black Widow-related goodies, just in time for her feature film debut, and a new Volcanic skin line. There‚Äôs one guy who doesn‚Äôt quite fit in, though. Steve Rogers is just rockin‚Äô a beach bod and shades.
Usually skins are meant to look super fancy or provide some alternative dress up, but this one is quite the opposite. He‚Äôs got a pair of pants, some aviators, and boots. It‚Äôs a fun skin, but definitely not as fan service-y as it could have gone ‚Äî there are certainly fans who would like to see Captain America trade in the pants for some tiny shorts.
Sun's out, guns out, shield out.
Bask in the summer heat with the American Dream Outfit for Captain America.
‚òÄÔ∏è Weekly Blog #45 - https://t.co/Tgiq5M9vhC pic.twitter.com/B6Zz2jO5U9
‚Äî Marvel's Avengers (@PlayAvengers) July 8, 2021



Marvel‚Äôs Avengers will receive a new expansion, War for Wakanda, later this summer in August. Square Enix is also working on Marvel‚Äôs Guardians of the Galaxy, which was revealed during E3 2021. Guardians of the Galaxy seems to be more focused on the core campaign over endgame activities, which has been a major post-launch development problem in Marvel‚Äôs Avengers.
articles.title: Marvel‚Äôs Avengers introduces Captain America‚Äôs abs

articles.description:
Image: Riot Games
    

  
Akshan‚Äôs on his way to every game in the League universe
 For the first time ever, Riot Games is hosting an in-game event that will impact all of its released games at the same time. The event is called Sentinels of Light, and on Thursday the developer revealed what‚Äôs coming to each game. 
The star of this event is Akshan, the Rogue Sentinel. Not only is he League of Legends‚Äô newest champion, he‚Äôs also coming to League of Legends: Wild Rift, Legends of Runeterra, and Teamfight Tactics over the course of the event. 
League of Legends is also getting an in-client story experience that casts players as a rookie Sentinel attempting to stop the Ruination that‚Äôs encroaching on Runeterra. The event will also add 11 new in-canon skins to the game, as well as the Ascended‚Ä¶
articles.title: League of Legends, Valorant, and all of Riot‚Äôs other games are part of the new Sentinels of Light event

articles.description:
Image: Maxis/Electronic Arts
    


  
A cottagecore paradise
 Each Saturday, the townspeople of Henford-on-Bagley descend upon the village square for the weekly fair. There are booths for fresh flowers and local vegetables, with picnickers huddled around woven baskets from which they pluck jars of canned fruit. Mushrooms grow wild in the nearby brambles, as mischievous rabbits and foxes play in the mossy groves nearby. Henford-on-Bagley is a self-sufficient community and an idyllic, pastoral paradise ‚Äî one that feels like it‚Äôs been plucked from the coziest of fairy tales.
The Sims 4‚Äôs newest expansion pack, Cottage Living, fully embraces the fairytale, cottagecore aesthetic that‚Äôs become increasingly popular over the past year. In the depths of the COVID-19 pandemic, cottagecore was a way‚Ä¶
articles.title: Cottage Living dragged my Sims outside to meet their neighbors

articles.description:
Image: Sonic Team/Sega
    

  
Sonic Colors Ultimate makes a great Sonic game better
 Sonic Colors stands out as one of the better Sonic the Hedgehog games of the past 30 years, and a new remaster, Sonic Colors Ultimate, promises to make a good game even better. A new trailer from Sega released Thursday shows off what Sonic fans can expect, in terms of new visuals, quality of life improvements, and brand-new features coming in Ultimate.
Of course, there‚Äôs the obvious 4K resolution and 60 frames per second visual upgrade to the original 2010 game. There‚Äôs also a new Rival Rush mode, wherein Sonic the Hedgehog will race through levels against Metal Sonic for unlockable rewards. Sonic Colors Ultimate will include a bit of visual customization, letting players spend in-game tokens on new shoe and glove patterns for Sonic, finally letting us realize the dream of Sonic the Hedgehog wearing yellow shoes.
There‚Äôs also a new Wisp power: Jade Ghost. With it, Sonic can fly around levels and pass through solid objects to access hidden areas. It‚Äôs Sonic the Hedgehog in no-clip god mode.
On the quality-of-life front, Sega and Sonic Colors Ultimate developer Blind Squirrel Entertainment will let players customize their control layouts and quickly get back into the action with new Tails Save spots. There‚Äôs more in the trailer above.
Sonic Colors Ultimate will launch Sept. 7 on Nintendo Switch, PlayStation 4, and Xbox One consoles, with a digital-only release on Windows PC coming to the Epic Games Store.
articles.title: The Sonic Colors remaster‚Äôs new stuff makes me want to play a Sonic game again

articles.description:
Image: Treyarch/Activision
    

  
Welcome to Mauer Der Toten
 The first trailer for Call of Duty: Black Ops Cold War‚Äôs latest Zombies map sends players back to Berlin, Germany to fight undead hordes. The new map is called Mauer Der Toten, and it will be a free update for Black Ops Cold War when it‚Äôs released next week.
Mauer Der Toten is set in an area of Berlin totally overrun by Zombies. But it seems that the map will be big enough to give players plenty of space to maneuver. There are plenty of buildings with rooftops to traverse, as well as a subway with deadly highspeed trains. It also seems like the new map will have secret areas to explore and traps to activate. There might also be an automated robot that players can activate to take some pressure off, if the zombies get a little too overwhelming.
In the trailer, the developer also shows off a weapon that fires several mini-rockets at a time, and a space-age pistol that seems to mow down zombies in a flash. As for enemies, there‚Äôs a skull-faced zombie that looks like it‚Äôs harnessing the power of the Dark Aether to empower other zombies around it.
Mauer Der Toten will be released on July 15 as part of Call of Duty: Black Ops Cold War‚Äôs midseason update, which should include more changes and additions on top of the new Zombies map.
articles.title: New trailer for Call of Duty: Black Ops Cold War Zombies map brings the undead to Berlin

articles.description:
Image: Respawn Entertainment/Electronic Arts
    

  
Battle in Apex‚Äôs newest Arena map, Overflow
 Apex Legends will piggyback its retro Genesis event with another content update, Respawn Entertainment and Electronic Arts announced on Thursday morning. Apex‚Äôs newest event, Thrillseekers, adds a new Arena map filled with lava, a weekly reward track, and a host of new cosmetics. Thrillseekers will run July 13 to Aug. 3.
Overflow, the new arena map, is the star of the Thrillseekers event and its trailer above. The setting is a large lava factory, where several ramps pump lava into a large pit (also filled with lava). Overflow has some narrow corridors and a long slope separating its upper and lower deck.
For each of Thrillseekers‚Äô three weeks, players can engage in a new reward track. Players who reach the end of the first week can pick up the Rampart Wastelander Set and some other goodies. The second week just offers Battle Pass boosters, metals, and Apex packs.
But the final week includes the Lethal Enforcer Bangalore skin and a boxing glove charm. Players can unlock these rewards by completing daily Challenges ‚Äî netting up to 1,000 points a day. Participants will need to earn 3,000 points per week to complete the reward tracks.
Of course, Thrillseekers also comes with a host of cosmetics for players to get their hands on, like boxing skins for Revenant and Pathfinder. There are also some in-store deals on returning skins in the Summer Splash Sale.
articles.title: Apex Legends‚Äô Thrillseekers event adds new Arena map, cosmetics

articles.description:
Image: Valve
    

  
TI 10 is heading to Romania
 After over a year of delays, Dota 2‚Äôs upcoming tournament, The International 10 has been moved to a new venue in a new country. The event, which was originally supposed to happen in Stockholm, Sweden, will now be held in Bucharest, Romania, Valve announced on Wednesday. 
Valve started working with Sweden to host the 2020 tournament a year ahead of time in 2019. As the summer-set event got closer, it became clear that it would have to be put on hold due to the coronavirus pandemic, which pushed the tournament from 2020 to 2021 ‚Äî something many tournaments and events like the Olympics and the European Soccer Championships faced as well. After the delay, the tournament was eventually rescheduled for August 2021. 
However, according to a post from Valve last month, despite several assurances over the previous year, the Swedish Sports Federation voted not to accept esports into its federation and Valve‚Äôs game was denied classification as an elite sporting event, meaning that Visa applications for players outside of the European Union would not be approved. 
Instead, players‚Äô entry into the country would be subject to the approval of individual border agents. This called teams‚Äô abilities to field their full rosters into question and made it impossible to guarantee the tournament‚Äôs integrity, so on June 21, Valve chose to delay the tournament and move it to a new location. 
On Wednesday, Valve announced that The International 10 ‚Äî Dota 2 Championships will officially be held at the Arena Nationala in Bucharest, Romania starting on Oct. 7 and concluding on Oct. 17. The tournament‚Äôs new venue can seat up to 55,000 fans normally, but it remains to be seen how Valve will set it up for The International ‚Äî though the developer did say that ticket information will be available soon.
articles.title: Dota 2‚Äôs The International 10 tournament has been moved to a new country

More souls, more problems
 World of Warcraft players have been battling against the nefarious Jailer since the start of Shadowlands, but the Sanctum of Domination raid is the first time we get to really spend any length of time with the big guy himself. The raid ends with a fight against Sylvanas Windrunner, a former hero of the Horde, as she makes sure the Jailer can carry out his dark plan. Despite the high fantasy setting, the supernatural realms of death, and the orchestral music that plays throughout, the end cinematic feels more like a scene from Passions than Warcraft.
[Warning: This article contains spoilers for the Chains of Domination patch.]
Sylvanas Windrunner is a Warcraft 3 character who is also one of the most popular characters in the ‚Ä¶

The same person who modded them out in the original has put them back in
 The modder who took out the gratuitous butt shots from Mass Effect 2 and 3 has now put them back in. 
It‚Äôs a comedic twist that has brought a long-running video game drama full circle. Scottina123, whose mod published last winter discreetly removed all the close-up shots of Miranda‚Äôs butt from the original Mass Effect series, now offers a mod that puts all the butt shots back into Mass Effect Legendary Edition. In the development of Legendary Edition, BioWare‚Äôs developers subtly acknowledged some of their questionable camera choices in the original games and changed the scenes for the remastered release.
Mass Effect‚Äôs original trilogy launched in 2007, 20‚Ä¶
articles.title: Mass Effect Legendary Edition mod puts the butt shots back into the game

articles.description:
Image: Rockstar Games
    

  
Break kneecaps, make money, cause problems
 The next Red Dead Online update, Blood Money, is all about kicking ass and taking money. Blood Money starts off in the city of Saint Denis, and has players team up with an underworld power player. Unlike previous updates like the frontier roles, there is no starting cost; players can just jump into the missions without acquiring gold bars. The Blood Money update will begin on July 13.
Cowboys can embark on a new mission type called Crimes, which can be completed solo or as part of a Posse. Sometimes, you might be stopping a coach and robbing the passengers, and other missions are a multi-stage robbery with debt collecting, kidnapping, and other unsavory methods. This is all done in pursuit of a new kind of currency called Capitale, which has been stolen and distributed among the common low lives of the West. Players can earn Capitale through Crimes, or find innocent people with Capitale in free roam, at which point you can rob them and take that sweet, sweet currency.
The second new mission type is called Opportunities. Once a player accumulates enough Capitale, underworld contact Guido Martelli will send you out into the world to rob, undermine, and kneecap a rising politician. The first Opportunities will launch with Blood Money on July 13; more will come in future.
Blood Money will come with a new variation on the game‚Äôs season pass called the Quick Draw Club, which divides the usual structure up into four shorter tracks. Pamphlets previously available through the season pass that offer in-game benefits will be placed on sale at the Fence, so they can be acquired much more easily. 
Finally, on July 13 both Red Dead Online and Red Dead Redemption 2 will offer Nvidia DLSS support for anyone on PC with eligible Nvidia GeForce RTX graphics cards. That‚Äôs a nice way to upgrade an already beautiful game, and re-explore the story campaign or take a look at Online‚Äôs new content.
articles.title: Red Dead Online‚Äôs Blood Money update means it‚Äôs crime time

Akshan has arrived
 Akshan is League of Legends‚Äô newest champion, and he can do something no one else in the game can: bring allies back from the dead. The new champion is part of the Sentinels of Light event, Riot Games‚Äô first multigame event. 
Akshan is a ranged champion with a grappling hook, but the most interesting part of his kit is the passive on his W. When an enemy champion kills one of Akshan‚Äôs allies, that enemy gets marked as a Scoundrel. Akshan gets special bonuses against Scoundrels while they‚Äôre alive, but if he kills one, whoever the Scoundrel killed is immediately revived at their fountain.


This is the first time Riot has introduced this kind of death-defying ability to League of Legends, changing one of the game‚Äôs most fundamental mechanics, w‚Ä¶
articles.title: League of Legends‚Äô newest champion can bring allies back from the dead

 World of Warcraft: Wrath of the Lich King is the inspiration for the next iteration of Pandemic, the hit cooperative board game series. Publisher Z-Man Games made the announcement Wednesday with a splashy teaser trailer on YouTube, which we‚Äôve embedded above.

Codenamed Assassin‚Äôs Creed Infinity, next title in series will contain multiple historical settings
 The next game in Ubisoft‚Äôs Assassin‚Äôs Creed franchise will unfold across multiple historical settings and receive persistent updates, according to a report from Bloomberg. A one-stop-shopping approach to mod downloading means creators lose some control of their work
 Nexus Mods is an A-list name among PC gamers, serving a McDonald‚Äôs-like 4.5 billion downloads of user-created content, changes, and improvements. The site is vital to a vibrant PC gaming culture whose players take pride in understanding how games are developed, and use that knowledge to tailor global bestselling franchises like The Witcher and The Elder Scrolls to their simplest taste. From the silly to the sublime, Nexus Mods has changed games for almost 20 years.

articles.description:
Image: Bungie via Polygon
    

  
Eliksni Hatchling lets Guardians live their Destiny Sim dreams
 Destiny 2‚Äôs Fallen babies took the world by storm early this summer when the studio launched Season of the Splicer. The adorable refugees have been living in the Tower for some time, but thanks to a new emote, players can finally Rafiki their way into the lives of the four-eyed infants. 
Thanks to Destiny 2‚Äôs new Solstice of Heroes update, Guardians can finally get their hands on a Fallen baby of their own. The emote is called Eliksni Hatchling, and it‚Äôs exactly what you want. Players manifest a holographic Fallen baby into their hands and lift it into the sky, just like the opening of the Lion King when Rafiki shows Simba off to the Pride Lands.
Image: Bungie via Polygon
      The Eliksni baby blinks and gets very excited once you lift it
  
The emote‚Äôs name, Eliksni Hatchling, uses the term ‚ÄúEliksni‚Äù instead of ‚ÄúFallen.‚Äù In the world of Destiny, Eliksni is the proper name for the Fallen race, and what they choose to call themselves. The Eliksni Quarter ‚Äî where most of the Fallen babies are hanging out during Season of the Splicer ‚Äî uses the same term. The term Fallen has always been a ‚Äúnickname‚Äù for the ‚Äúevil‚Äù Eliksni, and the Eliksni that are currently in the Last City seem to view it as a pejorative term.
The Eliksni Hatchling emote will run players 1,000 Silver ‚Äî a common price for an Exotic emote. Players can purchase 1,100 Silver via Steam or other platform stores for $9.99. Today  In Destiny ‚Äî a website that can tell players when Eververse items will go on sale for the earnable Bright Dust currency ‚Äî doesn‚Äôt show the Eliksni Hatchling emote showing up for anything other than Silver for the rest of the season. However, the schedule does have some classified items on it, so the emote could show up for Bright Dust later on in the season.
articles.title: Destiny 2‚Äôs newest emote lets you lift a Fallen baby like Simba

articles.description:
Photo: Orion Pictures
    

  
Publisher Nacon pegs RoboCop: Rogue City for 2023 release
 A new RoboCop video game is in development and slated for release in 2023, publisher Nacon announced Tuesday during a livestream called Nacon Connect. Titled RoboCop: Rogue City, the first-person shooter will put players in the total body prosthesis of Alex Murphy, aka RoboCop, on a mission to protect Detroit.
Beyond that, Nacon and developer Teyon didn‚Äôt reveal much about RoboCop: Rogue City, other than that it‚Äôs destined for PC and unspecified consoles in a couple years. Rogue City will feature an original story in the franchise‚Äôs universe, Nacon said in a news release. The publisher and developer are working with studio MGM to ‚Äúdevelop an authentic RoboCop game experience that is faithful to the franchise‚Äôs DNA,‚Äù Nacon said.
Teyon certainly has experience bringing ‚Äô80s action heroes to video games. The Polish studio is perhaps best known for its work on Terminator: Resistance, the 2019 shooter based on the Terminator franchise that wasn‚Äôt the worst thing ever, and Rambo: The Video Game, a 2014 rail shooter that was, frankly, pretty awful. A teaser trailer for RoboCop: Rogue City hints at something similarly low budget and perhaps a bit janky, but still shows promise.
RoboCop‚Äôs had a rough go of it in the video game space. Outside of the movie-to-arcade adaptation created by Data East in 1988, Murphy‚Äôs mostly starred in mediocre console games and free-to-play mobile fare (and one Mortal Kombat game) over the past few decades. Here‚Äôs hoping that Nacon (formerly known as Bigben Interactive) and Teyon will turn things around for ol‚Äô Robo for his next adventure.
As for RoboCop‚Äôs next cinematic adventure, a planned direct sequel was in the works with director Neill Blomkamp, who left the project shortly after it was announced.
articles.title: RoboCop‚Äôs getting a new video game

How to level your armor up in 2021

During this Solstice of Heroes, players can make their Magnificent armor glow without purchasing special items from the in-game Eververse store ‚Äî a white glow, just like last year. However, players who do purchase the Eververse glows will get Universal Ornaments ‚Äî meaning it‚Äôs a look players can apply to any armor piece ‚Äî that glows depending on their current subclass. Check out the patch notes for Destiny 2 patch 3.2.1
 Destiny 2‚Äôs summer patch is here, and it brings with it some big changes and new features. Players can also engage in the Solstice of Heroes summer holiday until Aug. 3.
